markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Water Breathing](/Spells.aspx?ID=1755)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 369 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** up to 5 creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

The targets can breathe underwater.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** The duration is 8 hours.

**Heightened (4th)** The duration is until your next daily preparations.
name: Water Breathing
